message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. As we're just starting the negotiation, I'm willing to make a reasonable offer. I'm thinking of selling the product to you for $12000. This is a great starting point, and I'm open to negotiations.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on this product. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9500. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still looking to get a better price for the product. Considering the value it holds, I'm willing to compromise. I'm proposing a new price of $11000. This is a reasonable compromise, and I believe it's a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I've given this some thought, and I'd like to counter with an offer of $10500. I hope this proposal is within your consideration range.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $10500. Considering the value of the product, I'm willing to make another compromise. I'm proposing a new price of $11500. This is my final offer, and I hope you can see the value in it.

I understand your position, Alice, and I respect your valuation of the product. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer $11000 for the product. I hope this aligns more closely with your expectations.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $11000. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to get closer to my original price. I'm proposing a new price of $12000. This is my final offer, and I hope you can see the value in it.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiating, Alice. After considering your last offer, I am willing to offer $11500 for the product. I hope this proposal is within your consideration range.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $11500. I'm getting close to my minimum price, and I need to get closer to my original price. I'm proposing a new price of $12500. This is my final offer, and I hope you can see the value in it.
